question: Some people believe that we cannot learn anything from the past for our life today, while others believe that history is a valuable source of information to understand human's life. Discuss both views and give your opinion. Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
text: Societies have been arguing the benefits of  past practices for a long time. Although many consider that the past cannot help us, others believe that history is crucial in order to create a prosperous future.

Obviously, humanity has been experiencing situations and they improve their skills for the prospect of the come across a similar position. In this context, the population tend to transmit their learnings to the next generations. For example, people learned and record how can cultivate plants; recorded production seasons of the agricultural products, climate conditions and their influences, because the recorded information provide sustainability of the process. İf they did not ensure data to us, we would suffer from problems numerous times. İn addition, they documented information about the natural catastrophes and challenges to cope with them. Moreover, scientists have been experimenting with the found treatment for the diseases. Obviously, if they did not save results, humanity would have to struggle to  experiment with solutions myriad times.
